name: Fish in Peril
description:
Note: I recommend to download the Windows version below instead of playing the Browser version. (The fish color for example isn't shown properly)

A Fish is in peril and needs your help!

Keep it alive for as long as possible, because some mean cats find it delicious looking, but don’t get distracted from the turtles that run around as well.

You might notice Jim (from my last LD game), but he’s not much of a help (Just got home from a marathon, playtesting some games), so it’s up to you to defeat the cats.

There are 12 Achievements.

Will you get them all? How long will you keep the fish alive?

Controls: Just click with your mouse on the cats.

Have fun and thank you for playing! :D

If you want to leave a comment and rate the game, you can visit this entry here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/fish-in-peril
